channel.title: Transformation Church - Video Podcast
channel.description: Transformation Church (TC) was started in 2010 and is led by Pastor Derwin L. Gray. We want to join God in His mission by embodying our vision to be a multi-ethnic, multi-generational, mission-shaped community that loves God completely (Upward), ourselves correctly (Inward), and our neighbors compassionately (Outward). We hope this podcast will be a tool in which the life-transforming love of Jesus Christ reaches the lives of many!

item.title: New: Love
item.description: Let Jesus teach you how to love with true love. In this message, Pastor Derwin teaches that this true love is the new love, which is Jesus' eternal love.

item.description: In "The Journey So Far," we celebrate God's faithfulness through our 7 years as a church family and review the past year.

item.title: New: Marriage
item.description: The purpose of marriage is to reflect Jesus and the Church. In "New Marriage," Pastor Derwin Gray and Vicki Gray teach questions to ask pre-marriage and holy habits to develop for a God-honoring marriage.

item.title: New: Sexuality
item.description: Our humanity is found in treasuring and honoring God with the sacred gift of sex. In this message, Pastor Derwin Gray and Vicki Gray teach that sex is an incredible gift from God that can be either used or abused.

item.title: Echoes Of Christmas: Echoes in the Garden - Part IV
item.description: The first Christmas was a beautiful mess. Join us to discover God's gift of redemption that began to resound in the garden.

item.title: Echoes Of Christmas: Echoes Of Christmas In The Garden - Part III
item.description: The Garden had rivers that produced water. Jesus is the Living Water that we need to drink to live. In this message, Pastor Derwin teaches how Christmas is the Lord God's commitment to meet every human need through Jesus.

item.description: Christmas is the unfolding story of how God overcame the devastating effects that death has on humanity and creation. In this message, Pastor Derwin teaches how God's gift of Life echoes through the Garden of Eden.

item.title: New Song: One Kiss Changes Everything
item.description: God longs for a people to share His love and eternal purpose with. Yet, humanity can't accomplish this dream for God. In this message, Pastor Paul teaches how God accomplished it for Himself through a kiss on the cross -- a kiss that leads to life, love, and God's Kingdom.

item.title: Roots: Redemptive Celebration
item.description: Over the past few weeks, we've learned and collected stories about the fruit (worship, connect, serve, give, invite) that comes from a life deeply rooted in Christ. Now, we celebrate Jesus rooting us in His redemptive work and love to form us into the people of God for the mission of God!

item.description: Hell is just as real as the New Heavens and New Earth. Join Pastor Derwin Gray for this sobering, yet hopeful teaching.

item.title: Heaven and Hell: What Will We Do There?
item.description: Do you think heaven is a spiritual world where people become angels or chubby, diaper-wearing babies with wings? Or is heaven here on earth and redeemed people with resurrection bodies? Is heaven boring? In this sermon, Pastor Derwin Gray gives a biblical view of the New Heavens and New Earth.

item.title: Heaven and Hell: Before We Get There
item.description: Is it God's goal for people to simply pray a prayer so they can go to heaven when they die? Or is God up to something far greater? Join Pastor Derwin Gray as he explores this question that can transform our lives.

item.title: Heaven and Hell: How Do We Get There?
item.description: Did you know that "heaven" was once on earth? The Bible is God's story of 'paradise lost is paradise once again being restored.' Pastor Derwin Gray explains how what was lost in the Garden will be restored, recreated and renewed.

item.title: Vision: A Foretaste of Things to Come
item.description: Jesus defeated sin! Jesus defeated death! And Jesus defeated Satan and his demons through His perfect life, death on the cross in humanity's place, and His resurrection! Jesus is Christus Victor! Join Pastor Derwin Gray as he explores the application of these breath-taking truths to the life of the Christ-follower.

item.title: Vision: A Good Samaritan...Jesus Are You Crazy!
item.description: Jesus stunned his first listeners with this parable! Join Pastor Derwin Gray as he uncovers and unfolds the essence of this outrageous parable. The Gospel reconciles humanity to God and to each other.

item.title: Vision: The Day Zacc Met Jesus
item.description: Pastor Paul Allen teaches on how God's grace changes everything! In this timeless, but always timely story, we see how Jesus loves, forgives, and transforms people so they can become a transforming presence in the world.

item.title: Vision: Rocks
item.description: How often are rocks of condemnation thrown at us when we mess up? How often do we throw rocks at ourselves and others because we fail to live up to moral expectations? In this sermon, Pastor Derwin Gray preaches on God's eagerness to show humanity His mercy, offer His grace, and restore our dignity. God does so because it pleases His heart and it produces Upward, Inward, Outward people. Grace is so much better than religion!

God does so because it pleases His heart and it produces Upward, Inward, Outward people. Grace is so much better than religion!

item.title: Vision: My Papa Runs to Me
item.description: Join Pastor Derwin Gray as he explores the depths of God's grace in this parable often called the Prodigal Son. He explains how God is eager to give us grace and mercy! This sermon reveals the very heart of God to a world that is suspicious of Him.
